name: Let Fix A Castle
description: Bowser's minions put graffiti on Princess Peach's Castle and it's up to Mario to clean it up, please note that this was not the original concept for the game and what you have instead is a rushed out version of the game. The original idea for the game was to be stylized like Mario Bros, with levels being single screens and being less so about level design and more so about enemies and managing both the enemies and graffiti and also didn't include the rising water. Sadly things didn't come out as planned due to time and us losing members and having to find members.
